div.p:
Curia burgi de Abirdene tenta per balliuos in pretorio eiusdem xjo die mensis Januarij anno
Dominj et cetera lxxxjmo /

quo die Willelmus de gordon germanus magistri ade de gordon' Rectoris de Kynkel
tanquam procurator et eo nomine eiusdem fratris sui / calumpniavit Willelmum malisson' de x li' g' in quibus sibi
tenetur ut asserit per suam litteram obligatoriam qui quidem Willelmus referebat se dicte obligacioni et ballivi assigna
runt dictis partibus diem lune ad quindenam pro Justicia vterque partj ministranda penes huiusmodi clameum
dicte obligacionis pro quia quidem actione prosequenda dictus Willelmus gordon' casu quo contigerit ipsum fore absen' consti
tuit Willelmum chamer de balnacrag thomam prat et Willelmum more coniunctim et diuisim suos procu
ratores pro seipso et pro thoma gordon' fratre suo promisitque de Rato et cetera

The samyn dai the assise has fundin and deliuerit / that patrik smyth sal content and deliuer til
John' colison' thre li' g' waring be virtu of ane obligacion' in thir merchandis' that is tosay
a part in hemp / a part in spissory and almondis a part in huny part in vynnakir and
part in bonettis of blak to the novmir of vj to xij s' g' the vj blak bonettis / and thir
gudis tobe pait and deliuerit to the said John' within the terme of law

xv die Januarij anno quo supra / coram Johanne Wormot vno ballivorum Johannes robertson manens in
tarves constituit Alexandrum Irvyne filium et apparentem heredem Alexandri Irvin de Drum suum procuratorem ad petendum
et recipiendum ab alexandro chaumer seriando duas marcas vsualis monete alias optentas per assisam et si
necesse fuerit prosequendum eundem in forma Juris / et promisit de rato et cetera testibus gilberto de
camera Dauid mathei et diuersis aliis

The xvij dai of Januar' the yer' forsaid The hail merchandis that has gude in the
barge has consentit / that Johne of culan' pas til Edinburgh and ane vthir merchand man
with him / and quhat cost / that thai wil mak gude faith that thai mak wpon' the lowsing
of the schip / It salbe tane of the tvn / tvnlike / And this was done in the tolbuthe in
presence of the aldirman balyeis and diuers' of the consale

The xix dai of Januar' the yer' et cetera lxxxj In presence of the aldirman balyeis and consale of abirdene
Adam andirson and Dauid hil burgez of the said burgh grantis thaim awande til a honorable knycht Sir William of
Knollis preceptor of Torfichin ilkane of thaim ten li' g' quhilkis thai oblise thaim to pay til him or his
factouris at the erast merchand schippis that passis of abirdene in flandris / except the litil kervel / the
said ser William or his factouris deliuerand til thaim or thare merchandis thar obligacionis and mastir Adam
of gordonis assignacion of the said somis or the copy tharof vndir instrument Attour the said knycht has
fundin John' of Knollis his bruthir souertie tokepe / the saidis Adam and Dauid scathles as law wil of the said
mastir Adam and al vthiris / And constitutis John' of Knollis procuratour tilanswer' in that matir for him

The samyn dai malcum mowet grantis him awand til the forsaid Sir William of Knollis knycht iij li' g'
et x s' g' / tobe payit til him or his factouris in the erast schippis as said is
Item Alexander rede grantis him awand til the said knycht thre li' g' / tobe pait in like wise as forsaid is et cetera

the samen dai mage voket the dochtir of vmquhile William voket grantit hir in Jugement
before the aldirman and balyeis fullely content and pait in novmirit money be the handis of Wilyam
blindsel yungar' of the Some' of viij merkis v s' iiij d' les of ane obligacion the quhilk the said
vmquhile William voket fadir to the said mage had of Thomas blindsel grauntser to the said
Wilyam blindsel of a mare some' / And dischargis and quytclamis the said Wilyam blindsel yungar' of
his ayris executouris and assignais of the said some' of aucht merkis v s' iiij d' les / And mare attour the
said mage becaus' scho had nocht the said obligacion present scho has sworn the bodily aith and with
hir William blindsel eldar / that scho has nocht sald nor analiit the said obligacion nor has nocht
made na procuratouris to folow it in contrare and preiudice of the said Wilyam blindsel yungar' / and gif
ony thing has bene done or beis done in tym tocum be hir or ony vthiris anent the alienacion
of the said obligacion or absenting of it scho reuokis and adnullis for hir' hir ayris executouris and
assignais / The quhilk forsaid some' of viij merkis v s' iiij d' les the said William was fundin
be the aldirman and consale topay to the said mage be virtu of the said obligacion as said is

Curia legalis burgi de Abirdene tenta per balliuos in pretorio eiusdem xxjo die mensis
Januarij Anno Dominj et cetera lxxxjmo

The sammyn dai William malisson' burges of the said burgh in presence of the aldirman
ballies and the court grantis him awand til a honorable knycht Sir William of Knollis
preceptor of Torfichin ten li' g' / quhilkis he oblis' him topay til the said knycht or his
factouris at the erast merchand schippis that passis of abirdene in flandris except
the litil kervel / the said ser William or his factouris deliuerand til him or his merchand
his obligacion and mastir Adam of gordonis assignacion of the said some' or the copy tharof
vndir Instrument Attour the said knycht has fundin Johne of Knollis his bruthir souerty
to kepe the said William scaithles as law wil of the said maistir Adam and al vtheris
And constitutis John' of Knollis procurator til answer' for him in that matir

Item the said dai Alexander of chavmer of murchil callit til entir malcum mowet as he that com borch
for his intra this dai til answer' and vndirly the law for strublans of Alexander rede ane
of the ballies in his office doing / comperit nocht et cetera

Eodem die perlectis tribus processibus dictis per henricum mortymar' burgensem de abirdene et ex parte eius
super recuperacione possessionis et proprietatis cuiusdam terre vaste cum pertinenciis Jacentis in le grene inter
terram Alexandri mernagh ex parte australi / et terram hered' Johannis Webstar ex parte boriali et terram
Andree mare ex occidentali parte et communem viam regiam versus oriens In defectu solucionis vnius annuj
redditus decim solidorum sibi annuatim et hereditarie debito et a longo tempore non soluto / dictus henricus
peciit a ballivis secundum formam processuum precedencium Juris et Justicie auisata / et hora diei legitt' expec
tata ceterisque peractis que ordo Juris exigit et requirit / decretum fuit per curiam et datum pro Judicio
per os thome talyour Judicatorum curie / quod dictus henricus mortymar peruenit ad suum clameum et recu
perauit possessionem et proprietatem dicte terre cum pertinenciis ob defectum solucionis annuj redditus prenotati
Teste curia

add.foreign: preceptor de torfichyn et th. symson

div.p:
The sammyn xxj dai of Januar' the yer' forsaid before the aldirman and ballies sittand in Jugement and
in presence of diuers' and mony notable personis / This poyntment was made betuix Sir William
of Knollis commandour of Torfichin / and Thomas symson burges of abirdene / that for samekle as
the said thomas is awand to the said ser William nyntene barrellis of salmond custum fre /
for the quhilk the said thomas sal deliuer to the said ser William or his procuratouris in the
toune of brugis in flandris fyve pund gret of the vsuale money of flandris / for half a last
of the salmond forsaid / quhilk v li' g' / he sal pay as said is at the cuming of his schip in
flandris that he has now in abirdene / And in like wise he sal pay to the said ser William
sex barrellis of salmond at the feist of Sanct peter aduincula callit lammes next eftir the
date of this write / And sevin barrellis at the feist of Sanct peter aduincula callit lammes
next thareftir folowing / ffor the souerte of the payment of the said v li' g' and Salmond forsaid
the said thomas and Jonet his spous' has resingnyt wp bath fee and franktennement
and hir Juntfeftment of thare land liand in the vuerkirkgate betuix the land of Adam of cra
furde on the ta part / and the land of thom rolland on the tothir part in the balyeis handis Alexander
rede and Dauid menyes / that gif it falyeis his schip tocum in flandris within the space of
foure moneth / na yit the v li' g' nocht pait within the space of the said four' moneth
the saidis balyeis sal gif to the said Sir William or his assignais heritable state sesing and
possession' of the said land / quhilk land sal remane with the said sere William ay and quhil he
be payt of the said sowme And gif it hapinnis the said thomas tofalye in the payment of the
salmond at ony of the termis forsaid / the said land sal ramane in like wise with the said sere
William ay and quhil he be payt of the hail some' And the said thomas and Jonet his spouse has
sworn into Jugement / that the said land is nocht sald na wedset to this dai Na at thai sal nowdir
sel na wedset it / bot that it is set til a man for thre yer' tak for the maile payand Ande
atour the said ser William has grantit of his fre wil to Jonet the said thomas spouse / that gif
oicht cumis to the said thomas bot gude / that scho sal brvke the said land mail fre / for al
the days of hir life et cetera

The xxiij dai of Januar' the yer' of god et cetera lxxxj / the consale and communite has grantit tofree
the aldirman and ballies of the taxt in sa fer as is vnrecouerabil of resone' and tobynde thaim vndir
thar common seil tharupon et cetera

The sammyn dai comperit before the aldirman and balliez' / in Jugement Jok blabre the soune
of quhilum Dauid blabir' burges of abirdene with his forspekar' Alexander of marr' and askit
him tobe kend til his fadir land as a burges ayr' wpon the quhilk the Aldirman and
consale avisit / decretit / that the said child suld be kend til his fadir land / and ordanit and chargit
Johne Wormot and alexander rede twa of the balliez' til pas and assign and ken him til the
samen land with the pertinencis eftir the law and consuetude of burgh
Curia burgi de abirdene tenta per ballivos in pretorio eiusdem xxviij die Januarij anno quo supra

Quo die thomas prat et Willelmus moore procuratores Willelmi gordon' comparuerunt coram preposito et
ballivis tanquam in termino eis licito in causa mota inter dictum Willelmum gordoune et Willelmum malisson'
de et super quadam obligacione x librarum g' / quj quidem Willelmus malissone' non comparuit et cetera

Eodem die malcomus mowet primo die vocatus responsurus plegio super eum per alexandrum rede porrecto pro iniusta
detencione vnius lew auri et xx solidorum / non comparuit / Ideo precipitur Dauid Duncanj seriando capere districtum
de dicto malcomo / et premunire eundem ad comparendum hodie ad quindenam si dies ipsa Juridica
fuerit alioquin proxima die Juridica inde sequen' responsurus tanquam secundo die processus

The penult dai of Januar' the yer' forsaid comperit in the tolbuthe before the Aldirman and ballies
petir gelissone' with his forspekar' Thomas of fife and chalansit James of Douglas
shipman for the sayling of his schip apon the craggis / the quhilk stude in gret danger of
schip and gude as he that tuke apon him tobe lodisman to sayl the schip in the havyn in
saufte / The quhilk James of Douglas has grantit in Jugement be oppyn confession'
that the faute was intil him of the saling on of the said schip callit the James of the fere
apon the craggis / and that the said peter the maistir nor his barnys had na falt tharof wpon
the quhilk / the said James put him in the skipparis wil and referit him to the aldirman ballies
and consale for correcion' and amendis tharof tobe made
Curia ballivorum tenta in pretorio primo die februarij anno Dominj supradicto

quo die Georgeus browne
conuictus per assisam amerciatur pro iniusta perturbacione et deforciacione Alexandri de camera et Duncanj straloch
seriandorum in ministracione suorum officiorum

The samen dai george browne was adiugit in amerciament for the wrangwis' occupacion
of Alexander Watsonis land wpon the quhilk he was folowit be a borch as it wes
decretit be ane sworn assise / the quhilk assise ordanit / that gif george browne
wil fynd souertie til the said Alexander Watson be the morn at none / for the payment
of his Witsonday mail next tocum that he sal remane with the said land quhil Witsonday
and fra thine furth to red the said land at the wil of the said Alexander / and falyeand of
the souertie as said is the said Alexander salhaf regres til his awne land
Curia legalis tenta in pretorio burgi de abirdene per ballivos eiusdem quarto die februarij anno et cetera lxxxjo

The quhilk day the action and caus' of summons movit be William quelp againis Sande
mathoson sone' and ayr' til vmquhile Johne mathosone' / is continuit be the said William
quelp til friday cum a xv daies in hope of concorde / but preiudice of ony party / the saide
summonis standand in sic force strinth and effect as the principale dai of the summons

Item eodem die magister Willelmus anffray constituit Robertum blindsele Dauid marr' et Willelmum
moyses coniunctim et diuisim suos procuratores in vberiori forma procuratorij / ad prosequendum Agnetem baxtar
pro iniusta detencione vnius ciphi wlgati le masar nuncupati ab eodem constituen' Et promisit
de rato / et ballivi assignauerunt dicte Agneti hodie ad quindenam ad respondendum plegio porrecto super
dicta materia Insuper dictus magister Willelmus causa quo contigerit prefatos suos procuratores fore absen' / constituit thomam
fife et Willelmum anffray fratrem suum vna cum antedictis suis procuratoribus coniunctim et diuisim procuratores suos ad
prosequendum agnetem baxtar vt supra et cetera

In curia tenta in pretorio per ballivos vj die februarij anno Dominj supradicto / georgius browne conuictus per
assisam adiudicatur in amerciamento pro iniusta perturbacione henrici owrum et tenetur emendare eidem vt Jura volunt
Et dictus henricus accusatus de iniusta perturbacione prefati georgij quitus factus fuit per assi
sam / que inuenit quod quicquid egit fuit in sua defensione vnde dictus georgeus in partem
emende dabit j libram cere ad lumen Sancti sanguinis

Eodem die ballivi assignauerunt thomas culan cum consensu eiusdem diem veneris proximo futuro peremptorie ad
respondendum plegio porrecto super eundem per alexandrum balcromby de iniusta detencione xxvij s' g'

Item the samen dai the ballies has assignit til William malisson' the son' friday cum
viij dais as dai peremptour with his awne consent til answer' til thomas rolland wpon
the wrangwis' withhalding of demj stik of brad clath quhilk fel til him be cavil and til the
borgh strekit tharupon et cetera

The samen dai before the aldirman and balyeis sittand in Jugement Cornelis corneilsone'
maistir of the brokin schip callit mary grace has made constitute and ordanit petir'
gelissone maistir vndir god of the schip callit the James of the fer' his verray lachful
procuratour irreuocabil actour and factour in the sickerest and stratast wise of procuratoury til
answere for him and in his name til al and sundry personis for al clames dettis and
chargis and specialy for xiiij li' x s' scottis acht til thomas spawdyne of Dunde of the
rest of a mare some' optenit apon him before the saidis balyeis and til mak payment
and contentacion of al somez' and dettis optenit and recouerit lauchfully wpon him in the
said cornelus name for the quhilk the said cornelis sal deliuer til the said peter al
and sindry gudis of the said brokin schip sayl towis takillis ankiris cabillis and
al vthir graith pertening til the said schip gottin or tobe gottin quhare evir thai
may be fundin with ful power' til persew the samyn gudis before quhatsumeuer Juge and
with power' tosubstitute and attour the said cornelis sal deliuer til the said peter a bar
rel of gvn powdir And the said cornelis has faithfully promittit til hald ferme
and stabil quhatsumeuer thing the said peter or his substitutis in his name ledis tobe
done the quhilk peter beand present tuke the said office of procuratory apon' him
and was oblist be the faith of his body his hand wphaldin til do and fulfil
al thingis aboue writin and tobe responsale as said is / the said cornelis giffand him
ful power' in his name towyn and to tyne tovynd and to lowse and he frely takand
the samen power' apon him et cetera

Item the samen dai the said cornelis grantit him awand iij li' vj s' til thom
narne for certane talch

Item the said day Androw luchris messinger til our Souerane lord grantit and declarit
before the balyeis in Jugement and the consale / that quhat thing James lesly aldirman
did in the taking furth of certane flesh and talch out of the kervel of the fere
it was at the command' of him in the kingis name

Curia ballivorum tenta per ballivos burgi de abirdene in pretorio eiusdem vijo die mensis februarij
Anno dominj et cetera lxxxjmo

Quo die Mariota theman sponsa Willelmi blindsel senioris comparuit in Judicio coram
ballivis que dixit et asseruit ac solempniter Jurauit ac Juramentum prestitit corporale / quod non fuit
choacta neque constuita ad vendicionem et alienacionem cuiusdam terre Jacentis in vico furcarum inter
terram Roberti quhite ex australi parte / et terram Alexandri sanchar' ex boriali parte vendite et
alienate Johannj sincler' et Mariote sponse sue / Et quod nuncquam reuocaret aut contradi
ceret huiusmodi vendicionem et alienacionem predicte terre sed easdem obseruabit inviolabiliter
et tociens quociens contigerit eam reuocare tociens quociens de nouo approbare et ratificare
promisit hiis testibus Alexandro menyes Alexandro rede Johanne cullan ijobus ballivorum gilberto de
camera Johanne cowtis Duncano smyth burgensibus philippo de Dunbrek seriando et thoma talyour Judicatore curie
cum domino Roberto leis notario et cetera
